text: mariyu allah mim'malni mattito srstincadu. Taruvata indriya binduvuto, a taruvata mim'malni (ada-maga) jantaluga cesadu. Mariyu e stri kuda ayanaku teliyakunda garbham dalcajaladu mariyu prasavincanu jaladu. Granthanlo vrayabadanide, perugutunna vadi vayas'su peraganu jaladu mariyu evani vayas'su taraganu jaladu. Niscayanga, idanta allah ku ento sulabham
